title: Requirements research and definition
listItems: Uncover and define functional and business requirements by conducting end user and stakeholder workshops
Legal and regulatory compliance

title: Process mapping
listItems: Documenting current, as-is business processes
Analyzing and proposing improved, to-be processes
Digitizing analog processes and implementing smart devices/automation

title: Accessibility and usability
listItems: Analyze existing solutions for usability issues (heuristic usability review)
Review solutions for accessibility and WCAG compliance
Communicate usability and accesibility concepts to stakeholders and developers

title: User interface design
listItems: Produce information architecture diagrams and wireframes
Create low fidelity mockups and prototypes
Complete pixel perfect designs ready for developer handoff

title: Frontend development
listItems: HTML, CSS, and JS markup
Theme and template customization / white-label software
Design implementation using common libraries and frameworks, and internal custom frameworks
Web application prototypes

title: Design systems
listItems: Comprehensive review and consolidation of existing design components
Organization and maintenance of Sketch/Figma/Adobe XD shared libraries
Documentation and implementation of developer friendly code component libraries and styleguides
Defining and setting up tool integrations and version control
Balancing internal and third-party design systems for overall look and feel in integrations and collaborations
Collaboration with brand and marketing teams
Quality assurance and review of adherence to design system

title: Documentation and training
listItems: Document procedures and how-tos for various audiences
Record training and feature review videos
Demonstrate software for coworkers, end-users, executives, stakeholders, and potential customers

title: Graphic design
listItems: Logo design, branding, and visual profile
Print material production like booth assets, flyers, reports, and packaging
Digital asset management
